title: I hate how hypocritical riot is about toxicity...
body:
For instance, they are so harsh punishing "toxic" people that talk shit in chat and flame others, when the simple solution is just to mute them and you won't read that anymore. Just a simple button. Yeah, some people are just toxic in general and should be punished, but I just mute them and I see no further problem. Or grow some balls and don't take seriously what some kid on the internet in a game told you.
But they don't want to deal with the real cause of that toxicity. Unbalanced games, unbalanced matchmaking, toxic promo games, autofill, whole last year of dynamic q, real INT-ers ruining 30-40 games in a row and still playing.
They aren't answering on any thread about trash matchmaking, autofill, etc... but god forbid you said something to the 0/10 guy on your team.
They create the cause and then punish the reaction of the same cause they created.

replies.body:
The problem is that it is very easy to deal with flamers, so riot does.

Dealing with inters, trolls and passive-aggressive griefing is much harder, it is not the sort of behavior even a smart program can identify, due to how complex it is.

The sheer number of games makes it impossible for real people to review everything, and what is obvious to players is not as obvious to riot. 

They have to sort through masses of reports (most of them just due to brats mashing reports on their entire team) and are only going to take notice of a troll/feeder if it is very repetitive.
Tbh i dont even know of its worth explainig why this threads are wrong, they come up every day man
i feel you man i feel you
